3: Goldfinch entered the Golden Vortex through the sandstorm according to the planned timeline.
What a... shitty place. This joint operation has—G-Goldfinch at the forefront...
Our mission is to scout the area... But—I-I think—w-we can contribute more...
During the briefing—l-last time—Commander Nikola's expression was very clear... a-about how disappointed—he was at us...
He equipped us with—t-the best scouting gears... and we only delivered a route through the man-made sand storm...
Browning's right. Not to mention that this is a joint operation! I heard that the famed Gray Raven is among the squads assigned. We must take this opportunity to showcase our abilities!
If we can't deliver—v-valuable intel... then the Goldfinches will only—b-be assigned missions... in the Arctic.
I've decided—t-to adjust the perimeter of our scouting area... It now includes the center of the Golden Vortex!
I-if we need to clear all these sand—t-then so be it. Goldfinch will figure out what's the deal with this place...
C-check your gears—we're leaving in—f-five minutes...
